What country is ð¦ðª?

People often ask which country uses ð¦ðª emoji flag. The answer is United Arab Emirates . United Arab Emirates is located in Western Asia continent. The country area is 83600 km2, and the capital city is Abu Dhabi ( 24.46667 , 54.36667 ). Some of the neighboring countries are Oman, Saudi Arabia , and the country is not landlocked. Some of the timezones in United Arab Emirates are UTC+04:00 . The currency used in United Arab Emirates is United Arab Emirates dirham ( AED ). People in United Arab Emirates speak mostly Arabic . United Arab Emirates is part of the Western Asia region.
